ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank VIORYL Chemical and Agricultural Industry Research, S.A. (Afidnes, Attica, Greece), for providing the mastic essential oil, myrcene, and α-pinene used in the study. We acknowledge the support of the M.Sc. courses “Molecular Biology by Research” and “Translational Research in Biomedicine”, Department of Molecular Biology and Genetics, Democritus University of Thrace.
